item.title: Welcome to KreativeWorx
item.description:
Welcome to KreativeWorx

Computer Repairs, Upgrades,Clean-ups, Back-ups & Advice

item.title: Who we are
item.description:
Who we are

KreativeWorx is a Kitchener-Waterloo based company.We have been performing computer services to individuals, families and small businesses for over 15 years.

item.title: What we do
item.description:
What we do

We meet with you to discuss your needs. From providing you with advice on buying a new computer, to repairing or restoring data from an existing PC. We provide email support to all our customers, and will come to your home or business to fix any issues.

item.title: ThinkPad T440, T440s, T450, T450s - Memory Module Replacement
item.description:
ThinkPad T440, T440s, T450, T450s - Memory Module Replacement

This video will illustrate how to replace the Memory Module(s) in your ThinkPad T440, T440s, T450 or T450s laptop. This video is useful for those who are replacing bad RAM or interested in upgrading their RAM. ** NOTE: Static electricity can destroy components. Use a grounding strap, and clean, non-conductive surface to work on.

item.title: How to Backup Your Computer: The Complete Guide to Computer Backup Options
item.description:
How to Backup Your Computer: The Complete Guide to Computer Backup Options

Computer loss, theft, natural disaster, and accidental deletion, are just some of the ways that you can lose the data you've spent so long creating and accumulating. The only way to prepare for the unexpected is to have a good backup strategy in place. So how do you backup your computer?

item.title: Cleaning A Computer - Inside and Out
item.description:
Cleaning A Computer - Inside and Out

It is important to clean your computer to keep it running and not become noisy or overheat. I recommend a cleaning every 6-12 months, or more frequently if you own pets.
